for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I will say the truth: but now I forbear   lest any man should</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;think of me above that which he seeth me to be   or that he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heareth of me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:007 And lest I should be exalted above measure through the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;abundance of the revelations   there was given to me a thorn in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the flesh   the messenger of Satan to buffet me   lest I should</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be exalted above measure.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:008 For this thing I besought the Lord thrice   that it might</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;depart from me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:009 And he said unto me   My grace is sufficient for thee: for my</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;strength is made perfect in weakness. Most gladly therefore</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;will I rather glory in my infirmities   that the power of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ may rest upon me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:010 Therefore I take pleasure in infirmities   in reproaches   in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;necessities   in persecutions   in distresses for Christ's sake:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for when I am weak   then am I strong.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:011 I am become a fool in glorying; ye have compelled me: for I</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ought to have been commended of you: for in nothing am I</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;behind the very chiefest apostles   though I be nothing.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:012 Truly the signs of an apostle were wrought among you in all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;patience   in signs   and wonders   and mighty deeds.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:013 For what is it wherein ye were inferior to other churches</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;except it be that I myself was not burdensome to you? forgive</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;me this wrong.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:014 Behold   the third time I am ready to come to you; and I will</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not be burdensome to you: for I seek not your's but you: for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the children ought not to lay up for the parents   but the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;parents for the children.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:015 And I will very gladly spend and be spent for you; though the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;more abundantly I love you   the less I be loved.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:016 But be it so   I did not burden you: nevertheless   being</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;crafty   I caught you with guile.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:017 Did I make a gain of you by any of them whom I sent unto you?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:018 I desired Titus   and with him I sent a brother. Did Titus make</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a gain of you? walked we not in the same spirit? walked we not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in the same steps?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:019 Again   think ye that we excuse ourselves unto you? we speak</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;before God in Christ: but we do all things   dearly beloved</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for your edifying.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:020 For I fear   lest   when I come   I shall not find you such as I</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;would   and that I shall be found unto you such as ye would</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not: lest there be debates   envyings   wraths   strifes</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;backbitings   whisperings   swellings   tumults:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>012:021 And lest   when I come again   my God will humble me among you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and that I shall bewail many which have sinned already   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;have not repented of the uncleanness and fornication and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lasciviousness which they have committed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:001 This is the third time I am coming to you. In the mouth of two</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;or three witnesses shall every word be established.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:002 I told you before   and foretell you   as if I were present   the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;second time; and being absent now I write to them which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heretofore have sinned   and to all other   that   if I come</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;again   I will not spare:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:003 Since ye seek a proof of Christ speaking in me   which to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;you-ward is not weak   but is mighty in you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:004 For though he was crucified through weakness   yet he liveth by</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the power of God. For we also are weak in him   but we shall</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;live with him by the power of God toward you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:005 Examine yourselves   whether ye be in the faith; prove your own</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;selves. Know ye not your own selves   how that Jesus Christ is</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in you   except ye be reprobates?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:006 But I trust that ye shall know that we are not reprobates.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:007 Now I pray to God that ye do no evil; not that we should</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;appear approved   but that ye should do that which is honest</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;though we be as reprobates.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:008 For we can do nothing against the truth   but for the truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:009 For we are glad   when we are weak   and ye are strong: and this</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;also we wish   even your perfection.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:010 Therefore I write these things being absent   lest being</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;present I should use sharpness   according to the power which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Lord hath given me to edification   and not to destruction.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:011 Finally   brethren   farewell. Be perfect   be of good comfort</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be of one mind   live in peace; and the God of love and peace</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shall be with you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:012 Greet one another with an holy kiss.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:013 All the saints salute you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>013:014 The grace of the Lord Jesus Christ   and the love of God   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the communion of the Holy Ghost   be with you all. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Book 48   Galatians</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:001 Paul   an apostle   (not of men   neither by man   but by Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   and God the Father   who raised him from the dead;)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:002 And all the brethren which are with me   unto the churches of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Galatia:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:003 Grace be to you and peace from God the Father   and from our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lord Jesus Christ</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:004 Who gave himself for our sins   that he might deliver us from</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;this present evil world   according to the will of God and our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Father:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 To whom be glory for ever and ever. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 I marvel that ye are so soon removed from him that called you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;into the grace of Christ unto another gospel:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 Which is not another; but there be some that trouble you   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;would pervert the gospel of Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 But though we   or an angel from heaven   preach any other</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gospel unto you than that which we have preached unto you   let</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;him be accursed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 As we said before   so say I now again   if any man preach any</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;other gospel unto you than that ye have received   let him be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;accursed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 For do I now persuade men   or God? or do I seek to please men?</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for if I yet pleased men   I should not be the servant of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 But I certify you   brethren   that the gospel which was</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;preached of me is not after man.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 For I neither received it of man   neither was I taught it   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;by the revelation of Jesus Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:013 For ye have heard of my conversation in time past in the Jews'</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;religion   how that beyond measure I persecuted the church of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;God   and wasted it:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:014 And profited in the Jews' religion above many my equals in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mine own nation   being more exceedingly zealous of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;traditions of my fathers.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:015 But when it pleased God   who separated me from my mother's</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;womb   and called me by his grace</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:016 To reveal his Son in me   that I might preach him among the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heathen; immediately I conferred not with flesh and blood:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:017 Neither went I up to Jerusalem to them which were apostles</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;before me; but I went into Arabia   and returned again unto</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Damascus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:018 Then after three years I went up to Jerusalem to see Peter</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and abode with him fifteen days.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:019 But other of the apostles saw I none   save James the Lord's</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;brother.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:020 Now the things which I write unto you   behold   before God   I</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lie not.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:021 Afterwards I came into the regions of Syria and Cilicia;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:022 And was unknown by face unto the churches of Judaea which were</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:023 But they had heard only   That he which persecuted us in times</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;past now preacheth the faith which once he destroyed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:024 And they glorified God in me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:001 Then fourteen years after I went up again to Jerusalem with</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Barnabas   and took Titus with me also.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:002 And I went up by revelation   and communicated unto them that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gospel which I preach among the Gentiles   but privately to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them which were of reputation   lest by any means I should run</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;or had run   in vain.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:003 But neither Titus   who was with me   being a Greek   was</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;compelled to be circumcised:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:004 And that because of false brethren unawares brought in   who</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus   that they might bring us into bondage:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:005 To whom we gave place by subjection   no   not for an hour; that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the truth of the gospel might continue with you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:006 But of these who seemed to be somewhat   (whatsoever they were</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;it maketh no matter to me: God accepteth no man's person:) for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;they who seemed to be somewhat in conference added nothing to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;me:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:007 But contrariwise   when they saw that the gospel of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;uncircumcision was committed unto me   as the gospel of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;circumcision was unto Peter;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:008 (For he that wrought effectually in Peter to the apostleship</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the circumcision   the same was mighty in me toward the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gentiles:)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:009 And when James   Cephas   and John   who seemed to be pillars</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;perceived the grace that was given unto me   they gave to me</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and Barnabas the right hands of fellowship; that we should go</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto the heathen   and they unto the circumcision.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:010 Only they would that we should remember the poor; the same</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which I also was forward to do.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:011 But when Peter was come to Antioch   I withstood him to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;face   because he was to be blamed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:012 For before that certain came from James   he did eat with the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gentiles: but when they were come   he withdrew and separated</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;himself   fearing them which were of the circumcision.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:013 And the other Jews dissembled likewise with him; insomuch that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Barnabas also was carried away with their dissimulation.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:014 But when I saw that they walked not uprightly according to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;truth of the gospel   I said unto Peter before them all   If</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;thou   being a Jew   livest after the manner of Gentiles   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not as do the Jews   why compellest thou the Gentiles to live</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as do the Jews?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:015 We who are Jews by nature   and not sinners of the Gentiles</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:016 Knowing that a man is not justified by the works of the law</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;but by the faith of Jesus Christ   even we have believed in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus Christ   that we might be justified by the faith of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   and not by the works of the law: for by the works of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the law shall no flesh be justified.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:017 But if   while we seek to be justified by Christ   we ourselves</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;also are found sinners   is therefore Christ the minister of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sin? God forbid.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:018 For if I build again the things which I destroyed   I make</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;myself a transgressor.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:019 For I through the law am dead to the law   that I might live</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:020 I am crucified with Christ: neverthless I live; yet not I   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ liveth in me: and the life which I now live in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;flesh I live by the faith of the Son of God   who loved me   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gave himself for me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:021 I do not frustrate the grace of God: for if righteousness come</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;by the law   then Christ is dead in vain.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:001 O foolish Galatians   who hath bewitched you   that ye should</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not obey the truth   before whose eyes Jesus Christ hath been</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evidently set forth   crucified among you?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:002 This only would I learn of you   Received ye the Spirit by the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;works of the law   or by the hearing of faith?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:003 Are ye so foolish? having begun in the Spirit   are ye now made</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;perfect by the flesh?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:004 Have ye suffered so many things in vain? if it be yet in vain.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:005 He therefore that ministereth to you the Spirit   and worketh</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;miracles among you   doeth he it by the works of the law   or by</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the hearing of faith?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:006 Even as Abraham believed God   and it was accounted to him for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;righteousness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:007 Know ye therefore that they which are of faith   the same are</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the children of Abraham.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:008 And the scripture   foreseeing that God would justify the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heathen through faith   preached before the gospel unto</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Abraham   saying   In thee shall all nations be blessed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:009 So then they which be of faith are blessed with faithful</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Abraham.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:010 For as many as are of the works of the law are under the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;curse: for it is written   Cursed is every one that continueth</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not in all things which are written in the book of the law to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:011 But that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;it is evident: for   The just shall live by faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:012 And the law is not of faith: but   The man that doeth them</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shall live in them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:013 Christ hath redeemed us from the curse of the law   being made</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a curse for us: for it is written   Cursed is every one that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hangeth on a tree:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:014 That the blessing of Abraham might come on the Gentiles</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;through Jesus Christ; that we might receive the promise of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spirit through faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:015 Brethren   I speak after the manner of men; Though it be but a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;man's covenant   yet if it be confirmed   no man disannulleth</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;or addeth thereto.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:016 Now to Abraham and his seed were the promises made. He saith</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not   And to seeds   as of many; but as of one   And to thy seed</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which is Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:017 And this I say   that the covenant   that was confirmed before</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of God in Christ   the law   which was four hundred and thirty</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;years after   cannot disannul   that it should make the promise</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of none effect.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:018 For if the inheritance be of the law   it is no more of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;promise: but God gave it to Abraham by promise.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:019 Wherefore then serveth the law? It was added because of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;transgressions   till the seed should come to whom the promise</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;was made; and it was ordained by angels in the hand of a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mediator.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:020 Now a mediator is not a mediator of one   but God is one.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:021 Is the law then against the promises of God? God forbid: for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if there had been a law given which could have given life</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;verily righteousness should have been by the law.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:022 But the scripture hath concluded all under sin   that the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;promise by faith of Jesus Christ might be given to them that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;believe.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:023 But before faith came   we were kept under the law   shut up</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto the faith which should afterwards be revealed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:024 Wherefore the law was our schoolmaster to bring us unto</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   that we might be justified by faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:025 But after that faith is come   we are no longer under a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;schoolmaster.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:026 For ye are all the children of God by faith in Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:027 For as many of you as have been baptized into Christ have put</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;on Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:028 There is neither Jew nor Greek   there is neither bond nor</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;free   there is neither male nor female: for ye are all one in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:029 And if ye be Christ's   then are ye Abraham's seed   and heirs</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;according to the promise.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:001 Now I say   That the heir   as long as he is a child   differeth</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nothing from a servant   though he be lord of all;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:002 But is under tutors and governors until the time appointed of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the father.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:003 Even so we   when we were children   were in bondage under the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;elements of the world:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:004 But when the fulness of the time was come   God sent forth his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Son   made of a woman   made under the law</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:005 To redeem them that were under the law   that we might receive</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the adoption of sons.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:006 And because ye are sons   God hath sent forth the Spirit of his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Son into your hearts   crying   Abba   Father.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:007 Wherefore thou art no more a servant   but a son; and if a son</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;then an heir of God through Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:008 Howbeit then   when ye knew not God   ye did service unto them</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which by nature are no gods.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:009 But now   after that ye have known God   or rather are known of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;God   how turn ye again to the weak and beggarly elements</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;whereunto ye desire again to be in bondage?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:010 Ye observe days   and months   and times   and years.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:011 I am afraid of you   lest I have bestowed upon you labour in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vain.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:012 Brethren   I beseech you   be as I am; for I am as ye are: ye</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;have not injured me at all.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:013 Ye know how through infirmity of the flesh I preached the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gospel unto you at the first.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:014 And my temptation which was in my flesh ye despised not   nor</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rejected; but received me as an angel of God   even as Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:015 Where is then the blessedness ye spake of? for I bear you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;record   that   if it had been possible   ye would have plucked</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;out your own eyes   and have given them to me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:016 Am I therefore become your enemy   because I tell you the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;truth?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:017 They zealously affect you   but not well; yea   they would</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;exclude you   that ye might affect them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:018 But it is good to be zealously affected always in a good</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;thing   and not only when I am present with you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:019 My little children   of whom I travail in birth again until</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ be formed in you</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:020 I desire to be present with you now   and to change my voice;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for I stand in doubt of you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:021 Tell me   ye that desire to be under the law   do ye not hear</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the law?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:022 For it is written   that Abraham had two sons   the one by a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bondmaid   the other by a freewoman.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:023 But he who was of the bondwoman was born after the flesh; but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;he of the freewoman was by promise.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:024 Which things are an allegory: for these are the two covenants;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the one from the mount Sinai   which gendereth to bondage</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which is Agar.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:025 For this Agar is mount Sinai in Arabia   and answereth to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jerusalem which now is   and is in bondage with her children.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:026 But Jerusalem which is above is free   which is the mother of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;us all.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:027 For it is written   Rejoice   thou barren that bearest not;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;break forth and cry   thou that travailest not: for the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;desolate hath many more children than she which hath an</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;husband.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:028 Now we   brethren   as Isaac was   are the children of promise.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:029 But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that was born after the Spirit   even so it is now.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:030 Nevertheless what saith the scripture? Cast out the bondwoman</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and her son: for the son of the bondwoman shall not be heir</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with the son of the freewoman.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:031 So then   brethren   we are not children of the bondwoman   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the free.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:001 Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;us free   and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:002 Behold   I Paul say unto you   that if ye be circumcised   Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shall profit you nothing.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:003 For I testify again to every man that is circumcised   that he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;is a debtor to do the whole law.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:004 Christ is become of no effect unto you   whosoever of you are</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;justified by the law; ye are fallen from grace.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:005 For we through the Spirit wait for the hope of righteousness</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;by faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:006 For in Jesus Christ neither circumcision availeth any thing</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nor uncircumcision; but faith which worketh by love.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:007 Ye did run well; who did hinder you that ye should not obey</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the truth?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:008 This persuasion cometh not of him that calleth you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:009 A little leaven leaveneth the whole lump.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:010 I have confidence in you through the Lord   that ye will be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;none otherwise minded: but he that troubleth you shall bear</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;his judgment   whosoever he be.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:011 And I   brethren   if I yet preach circumcision   why do I yet</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;suffer persecution? then is the offence of the cross ceased.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:012 I would they were even cut off which trouble you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:013 For   brethren   ye have been called unto liberty; only use not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;liberty for an occasion to the flesh   but by love serve one</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;another.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:014 For all the law is fulfilled in one word   even in this; Thou</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:015 But if ye bite and devour one another   take heed that ye be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not consumed one of another.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:016 This I say then   Walk in the Spirit   and ye shall not fulfil</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the lust of the flesh.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:017 For the flesh lusteth against the Spirit   and the Spirit</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;against the flesh: and these are contrary the one to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;other: so that ye cannot do the things that ye would.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:018 But if ye be led of the Spirit   ye are not under the law.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:019 Now the works of the flesh are manifest   which are these;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Adultery   fornication   uncleanness   lasciviousness</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:020 Idolatry   witchcraft   hatred   variance   emulations   wrath</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;strife   seditions   heresies</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:021 Envyings   murders   drunkenness   revellings   and such like: of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the which I tell you before   as I have also told you in time</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;past   that they which do such things shall not inherit the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kingdom of God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:022 But the fruit of the Spirit is love   joy   peace</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;longsuffering   gentleness   goodness   faith</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:023 Meekness   temperance: against such there is no law.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:024 And they that are Christ's have crucified the flesh with the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;affections and lusts.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:025 If we live in the Spirit   let us also walk in the Spirit.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:026 Let us not be desirous of vain glory   provoking one another</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;envying one another.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:001 Brethren   if a man be overtaken in a fault   ye which are</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spiritual   restore such an one in the spirit of meekness;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;considering thyself   lest thou also be tempted.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:002 Bear ye one another's burdens   and so fulfil the law of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:003 For if a man think himself to be something   when he is</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nothing   he deceiveth himself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:004 But let every man prove his own work   and then shall he have</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rejoicing in himself alone   and not in another.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:005 For every man shall bear his own burden.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:006 Let him that is taught in the word communicate unto him that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teacheth in all good things.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:007 Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;soweth   that shall he also reap.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:008 For he that soweth to his flesh shall of the flesh reap</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;corruption; but he that soweth to the Spirit shall of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Spirit reap life everlasting.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:009 And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shall reap   if we faint not.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:010 As we have therefore opportunity   let us do good unto all men</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;especially unto them who are of the household of faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:011 Ye see how large a letter I have written unto you with mine</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;own hand.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:012 As many as desire to make a fair shew in the flesh   they</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;constrain you to be circumcised; only lest they should suffer</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;persecution for the cross of Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:013 For neither they themselves who are circumcised keep the law;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;but desire to have you circumcised   that they may glory in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;your flesh.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:014 But God forbid that I should glory   save in the cross of our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lord Jesus Christ   by whom the world is crucified unto me   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I unto the world.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:015 For in Christ Jesus neither circumcision availeth any thing</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nor uncircumcision   but a new creature.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:016 And as many as walk according to this rule   peace be on them</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and mercy   and upon the Israel of God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:017 From henceforth let no man trouble me: for I bear in my body</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the marks of the Lord Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:018 Brethren   the grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spirit. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Book 49   Ephesians</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:001 Paul   an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God   to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saints which are at Ephesus   and to the faithful in Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:002 Grace be to you   and peace   from God our Father   and from the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lord Jesus Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:003 Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ   who</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hath blessed us with all spiritual blessings in heavenly</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;places in Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:004 According as he hath chosen us in him before the foundation of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the world   that we should be holy and without blame before him</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in love:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 Having predestinated us unto the adoption of children by Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ to himself   according to the good pleasure of his will</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 To the praise of the glory of his grace   wherein he hath made</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;us accepted in the beloved.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 In whom we have redemption through his blood   the forgiveness</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of sins   according to the riches of his grace;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 Wherein he hath abounded toward us in all wisdom and prudence;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 Having made known unto us the mystery of his will   according</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to his good pleasure which he hath purposed in himself:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 That in the dispensation of the fulness of times he might</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;gather together in one all things in Christ   both which are in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heaven   and which are on earth; even in him:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 In whom also we have obtained an inheritance   being</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;predestinated according to the purpose of him who worketh all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;things after the counsel of his own will:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 That we should be to the praise of his glory   who first</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trusted in Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:013 In whom ye also trusted   after that ye heard the word of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;truth   the gospel of your salvation: in whom also after that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ye believed   ye were sealed with that holy Spirit of promise</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:014 Which is the earnest of our inheritance until the redemption</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the purchased possession   unto the praise of his glory.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:015 Wherefore I also   after I heard of your faith in the Lord</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus   and love unto all the saints</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:016 Cease not to give thanks for you   making mention of you in my</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prayers;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:017 That the God of our Lord Jesus Christ   the Father of glory</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;may give unto you the spirit of wisdom and revelation in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;knowledge of him:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:018 The eyes of your understanding being enlightened; that ye may</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;know what is the hope of his calling   and what the riches of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the glory of his inheritance in the saints</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:019 And what is the exceeding greatness of his power to us-ward</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;who believe   according to the working of his mighty power</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:020 Which he wrought in Christ   when he raised him from the dead</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and set him at his own right hand in the heavenly places</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:021 Far above all principality   and power   and might   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dominion   and every name that is named   not only in this</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;world   but also in that which is to come:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:022 And hath put all things under his feet   and gave him to be the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;head over all things to the church</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:023 Which is his body   the fulness of him that filleth all in all.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:001 And you hath he quickened   who were dead in trespasses and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sins;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:002 Wherein in time past ye walked according to the course of this</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;world   according to the prince of the power of the air   the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spirit that now worketh in the children of disobedience:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:003 Among whom also we all had our conversation in times past in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the lusts of our flesh   fulfilling the desires of the flesh</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and of the mind; and were by nature the children of wrath</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;even as others.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:004 But God   who is rich in mercy   for his great love wherewith he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;loved us</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:005 Even when we were dead in sins   hath quickened us together</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with Christ   (by grace ye are saved;)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:006 And hath raised us up together   and made us sit together in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heavenly places in Christ Jesus:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:007 That in the ages to come he might shew the exceeding riches of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;his grace in his kindness toward us through Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:008 For by grace are ye saved through faith; and that not of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;yourselves: it is the gift of God:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:009 Not of works   lest any man should boast.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:010 For we are his workmanship   created in Christ Jesus unto good</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;works   which God hath before ordained that we should walk in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:011 Wherefore remember   that ye being in time past Gentiles in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;flesh   who are called Uncircumcision by that which is called</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Circumcision in the flesh made by hands;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:012 That at that time ye were without Christ   being aliens from</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the commonwealth of Israel   and strangers from the covenants</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of promise   having no hope   and without God in the world:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:013 But now in Christ Jesus ye who sometimes were far off are made</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nigh by the blood of Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:014 For he is our peace   who hath made both one   and hath broken</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;down the middle wall of partition between us;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:015 Having abolished in his flesh the enmity   even the law of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;commandments contained in ordinances; for to make in himself</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of twain one new man   so making peace;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:016 And that he might reconcile both unto God in one body by the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cross   having slain the enmity thereby:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:017 And came and preached peace to you which were afar off   and to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them that were nigh.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:018 For through him we both have access by one Spirit unto the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Father.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:019 Now therefore ye are no more strangers and foreigners   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;fellowcitizens with the saints   and of the household of God;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:020 And are built upon the foundation of the apostles and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prophets   Jesus Christ himself being the chief corner stone;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:021 In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;holy temple in the Lord:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:022 In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;through the Spirit.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:001 For this cause I Paul   the prisoner of Jesus Christ for you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Gentiles</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:002 If ye have heard of the dispensation of the grace of God which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;is given me to you-ward:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:003 How that by revelation he made known unto me the mystery; (as</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I wrote afore in few words</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:004 Whereby   when ye read   ye may understand my knowledge in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mystery of Christ)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:005 Which in other ages was not made known unto the sons of men</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as it is now revealed unto his holy apostles and prophets by</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Spirit;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:006 That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs   and of the same body</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:007 Whereof I was made a minister   according to the gift of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;power.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:008 Unto me   who am less than the least of all saints   is this</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;grace given   that I should preach among the Gentiles the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unsearchable riches of Christ;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:009 And to make all men see what is the fellowship of the mystery</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which from the beginning of the world hath been hid in God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;who created all things by Jesus Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:010 To the intent that now unto the principalities and powers in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heavenly places might be known by the church the manifold</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wisdom of God</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:011 According to the eternal purpose which he purposed in Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus our Lord:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:012 In whom we have boldness and access with confidence by the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;faith of him.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:013 Wherefore I desire that ye faint not at my tribulations for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;you   which is your glory.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:014 For this cause I bow my knees unto the Father of our Lord</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus Christ</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:015 Of whom the whole family in heaven and earth is named</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:016 That he would grant you   according to the riches of his glory</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to be strengthened with might by his Spirit in the inner man;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:017 That Christ may dwell in your hearts by faith; that ye   being</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rooted and grounded in love</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:018 May be able to comprehend with all saints what is the breadth</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and length   and depth   and height;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:019 And to know the love of Christ   which passeth knowledge   that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ye might be filled with all the fulness of God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:020 Now unto him that is able to do exceeding abundantly above all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that we ask or think   according to the power that worketh in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;us</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:021 Unto him be glory in the church by Christ Jesus throughout all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ages   world without end. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:001 I therefore   the prisoner of the Lord   beseech you that ye</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;walk worthy of the vocation wherewith ye are called</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:002 With all lowliness and meekness   with longsuffering</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;forbearing one another in love;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:003 Endeavouring to keep the unity of the Spirit in the bond of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;peace.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:004 There is one body   and one Spirit   even as ye are called in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;one hope of your calling;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:005 One Lord   one faith   one baptism</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:006 One God and Father of all   who is above all   and through all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and in you all.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:007 But unto every one of us is given grace according to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;measure of the gift of Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:008 Wherefore he saith   When he ascended up on high   he led</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;captivity captive   and gave gifts unto men.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:009 (Now that he ascended   what is it but that he also descended</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;first into the lower parts of the earth?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:010 He that descended is the same also that ascended up far above</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all heavens   that he might fill all things.)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:011 And he gave some   apostles; and some   prophets; and some</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evangelists; and some   pastors and teachers;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:012 For the perfecting of the saints   for the work of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ministry   for the edifying of the body of Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:013 Till we all come in the unity of the faith   and of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;knowledge of the Son of God   unto a perfect man   unto the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;measure of the stature of the fulness of Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:014 That we henceforth be no more children   tossed to and fro   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;carried about with every wind of doctrine   by the sleight of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;men   and cunning craftiness   whereby they lie in wait to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deceive;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:015 But speaking the truth in love   may grow up into him in all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;things   which is the head   even Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:016 From whom the whole body fitly joined together and compacted</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;by that which every joint supplieth   according to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;effectual working in the measure of every part   maketh</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;increase of the body unto the edifying of itself in love.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:017 This I say therefore   and testify in the Lord   that ye</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;henceforth walk not as other Gentiles walk   in the vanity of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;their mind</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:018 Having the understanding darkened   being alienated from the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;life of God through the ignorance that is in them   because of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the blindness of their heart:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:019 Who being past feeling have given themselves over unto</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lasciviousness   to work all uncleanness with greediness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:020 But ye have not so learned Christ;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:021 If so be that ye have heard him   and have been taught by him</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as the truth is in Jesus:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:022 That ye put off concerning the former conversation the old</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;man   which is corrupt according to the deceitful lusts;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:023 And be renewed in the spirit of your mind;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:024 And that ye put on the new man   which after God is created in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;righteousness and true holiness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:025 Wherefore putting away lying   speak every man truth with his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;neighbour: for we are members one of another.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:026 Be ye angry   and sin not: let not the sun go down upon your</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wrath:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:027 Neither give place to the devil.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:028 Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;working with his hands the thing which is good   that he may</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;have to give to him that needeth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:029 Let no corrupt communication proceed out of your mouth   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that which is good to the use of edifying   that it may</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;minister grace unto the hearers.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:030 And grieve not the holy Spirit of God   whereby ye are sealed</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto the day of redemption.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:031 Let all bitterness   and wrath   and anger   and clamour   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;evil speaking   be put away from you   with all malice:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:032 And be ye kind one to another   tenderhearted   forgiving one</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;another   even as God for Christ's sake hath forgiven you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:001 Be ye therefore followers of God   as dear children;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:002 And walk in love   as Christ also hath loved us   and hath given</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sweetsmelling savour.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:003 But fornication   and all uncleanness   or covetousness   let it</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not be once named among you   as becometh saints;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:004 Neither filthiness   nor foolish talking   nor jesting   which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;are not convenient: but rather giving of thanks.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:005 For this ye know   that no whoremonger   nor unclean person   nor</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;covetous man   who is an idolater   hath any inheritance in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kingdom of Christ and of God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:006 Let no man deceive you with vain words: for because of these</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;things cometh the wrath of God upon the children of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;disobedience.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:007 Be not ye therefore partakers with them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:008 For ye were sometimes darkness   but now are ye light in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lord: walk as children of light:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:009 (For the fruit of the Spirit is in all goodness and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;righteousness and truth;)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:010 Proving what is acceptable unto the Lord.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:011 And have no fellowship with the unfruitful works of darkness</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;but rather reprove them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:012 For it is a shame even to speak of those things which are done</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of them in secret.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:013 But all things that are reproved are made manifest by the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;light: for whatsoever doth make manifest is light.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:014 Wherefore he saith   Awake thou that sleepest   and arise from</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the dead   and Christ shall give thee light.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:015 See then that ye walk circumspectly   not as fools   but as</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wise</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:016 Redeeming the time   because the days are evil.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:017 Wherefore be ye not unwise   but understanding what the will of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Lord is.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:018 And be not drunk with wine   wherein is excess; but be filled</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with the Spirit;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:019 Speaking to yourselves in psalms and hymns and spiritual</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;songs   singing and making melody in your heart to the Lord;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:020 Giving thanks always for all things unto God and the Father in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the name of our Lord Jesus Christ;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:021 Submitting yourselves one to another in the fear of God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:022 Wives   submit yourselves unto your own husbands   as unto the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lord.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:023 For the husband is the head of the wife   even as Christ is the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;head of the church: and he is the saviour of the body.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:024 Therefore as the church is subject unto Christ   so let the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wives be to their own husbands in every thing.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:025 Husbands   love your wives   even as Christ also loved the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;church   and gave himself for it;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:026 That he might sanctify and cleanse it with the washing of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;water by the word</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:027 That he might present it to himself a glorious church   not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;having spot   or wrinkle   or any such thing; but that it should</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be holy and without blemish.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:028 So ought men to love their wives as their own bodies. He that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;loveth his wife loveth himself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:029 For no man ever yet hated his own flesh; but nourisheth and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;cherisheth it   even as the Lord the church:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:030 For we are members of his body   of his flesh   and of his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bones.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:031 For this cause shall a man leave his father and mother   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shall be joined unto his wife   and they two shall be one</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;flesh.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:032 This is a great mystery: but I speak concerning Christ and the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;church.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:033 Nevertheless let every one of you in particular so love his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wife even as himself; and the wife see that she reverence her</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;husband.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:001 Children   obey your parents in the Lord: for this is right.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:002 Honour thy father and mother; which is the first commandment</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with promise;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:003 That it may be well with thee   and thou mayest live long on</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the earth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:004 And   ye fathers   provoke not your children to wrath: but bring</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them up in the nurture and admonition of the Lord.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:005 Servants   be obedient to them that are your masters according</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to the flesh   with fear and trembling   in singleness of your</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heart   as unto Christ;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:006 Not with eyeservice   as menpleasers; but as the servants of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   doing the will of God from the heart;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:007 With good will doing
