ourselves glory in you in the churches of God for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;your patience and faith in all your persecutions and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tribulations that ye endure:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 Which is a manifest token of the righteous judgment of God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that ye may be counted worthy of the kingdom of God   for which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ye also suffer:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 Seeing it is a righteous thing with God to recompense</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;tribulation to them that trouble you;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 And to you who are troubled rest with us   when the Lord Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shall be revealed from heaven with his mighty angels</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 In flaming fire taking vengeance on them that know not God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and that obey not the gospel of our Lord Jesus Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 Who shall be punished with everlasting destruction from the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;presence of the Lord   and from the glory of his power;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 When he shall come to be glorified in his saints   and to be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;admired in all them that believe (because our testimony among</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;you was believed) in that day.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 Wherefore also we pray always for you   that our God would</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;count you worthy of this calling   and fulfil all the good</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pleasure of his goodness   and the work of faith with power:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 That the name of our Lord Jesus Christ may be glorified in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;you   and ye in him   according to the grace of our God and the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Lord Jesus Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:001 Now we beseech you   brethren   by the coming of our Lord Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   and by our gathering together unto him</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:002 That ye be not soon shaken in mind   or be troubled   neither by</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spirit   nor by word   nor by letter as from us   as that the day</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of Christ is at hand.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:003 Let no man deceive you by any means: for that day shall not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;come   except there come a falling away first   and that man of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sin be revealed   the son of perdition;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:004 Who opposeth and exalteth himself above all that is called</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;God   or that is worshipped; so that he as God sitteth in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;temple of God   shewing himself that he is God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:005 Remember ye not   that   when I was yet with you   I told you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;these things?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:006 And now ye know what withholdeth that he might be revealed in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;his time.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:007 For the mystery of iniquity doth already work: only he who now</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;letteth will let   until he be taken out of the way.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:008 And then shall that Wicked be revealed   whom the Lord shall</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;consume with the spirit of his mouth   and shall destroy with</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the brightness of his coming:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:009 Even him   whose coming is after the working of Satan with all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;power and signs and lying wonders</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:010 And with all deceivableness of unrighteousness in them that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;perish; because they received not the love of the truth   that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;they might be saved.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:011 And for this cause God shall send them strong delusion   that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;they should believe a lie:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:012 That they all might be damned who believed not the truth   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;had pleasure in unrighteousness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:013 But we are bound to give thanks alway to God for you   brethren</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;beloved of the Lord   because God hath from the beginning</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;chosen you to salvation through sanctification of the Spirit</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and belief of the truth:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:014 Whereunto he called you by our gospel   to the obtaining of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;glory of our Lord Jesus Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:015 Therefore   brethren   stand fast   and hold the traditions which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ye have been taught   whether by word   or our epistle.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:016 Now our Lord Jesus Christ himself   and God   even our Father</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which hath loved us   and hath given us everlasting consolation</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and good hope through grace</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:017 Comfort your hearts   and stablish you in every good word and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;work.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:001 Finally   brethren   pray for us   that the word of the Lord may</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;have free course   and be glorified   even as it is with you:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:002 And that we may be delivered from unreasonable and wicked men:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;for all men have not faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:003 But the Lord is faithful   who shall stablish you   and keep you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;from evil.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:004 And we have confidence in the Lord touching you   that ye both</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do and will do the things which we command you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:005 And the Lord direct your hearts into the love of God   and into</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the patient waiting for Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:006 Now we command you   brethren   in the name of our Lord Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   that ye withdraw yourselves from every brother that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;walketh disorderly   and not after the tradition which he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;received of us.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:007 For yourselves know how ye ought to follow us: for we behaved</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;not ourselves disorderly among you;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:008 Neither did we eat any man's bread for nought; but wrought</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with labour and travail night and day   that we might not be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;chargeable to any of you:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:009 Not because we have not power   but to make ourselves an</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ensample unto you to follow us.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:010 For even when we were with you   this we commanded you   that if</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;any would not work   neither should he eat.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:011 For we hear that there are some which walk among you</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;disorderly   working not at all   but are busybodies.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:012 Now them that are such we command and exhort by our Lord Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   that with quietness they work   and eat their own</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bread.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:013 But ye   brethren   be not weary in well doing.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:014 And if any man obey not our word by this epistle   note that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;man   and have no company with him   that he may be ashamed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:015 Yet count him not as an enemy   but admonish him as a brother.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:016 Now the Lord of peace himself give you peace always by all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;means. The Lord be with you all.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:017 The salutation of Paul with mine own hand   which is the token</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in every epistle: so I write.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:018 The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with you all. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Book 54   1 Timothy</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:001 Paul   an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Saviour   and Lord Jesus Christ   which is our hope;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:002 Unto Timothy   my own son in the faith: Grace   mercy   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;peace   from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:003 As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus   when I went into</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Macedonia   that thou mightest charge some that they teach no</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;other doctrine</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:004 Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies   which</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;minister questions   rather than godly edifying which is in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;faith: so do.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and of a good conscience   and of faith unfeigned:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;jangling;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;they say   nor whereof they affirm.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 But we know that the law is good   if a man use it lawfully;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 Knowing this   that the law is not made for a righteous man</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;but for the lawless and disobedient   for the ungodly and for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sinners   for unholy and profane   for murderers of fathers and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;murderers of mothers   for manslayers</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 For whoremongers   for them that defile themselves with</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mankind   for menstealers   for liars   for perjured persons   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doctrine;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God   which was</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;committed to my trust.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord   who hath enabled me   for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that he counted me faithful   putting me into the ministry;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:013 Who was before a blasphemer   and a persecutor   and injurious:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;but I obtained mercy   because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:014 And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and love which is in Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:015 This is a faithful saying   and worthy of all acceptation   that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;chief.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:016 Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy   that in me first</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering   for a pattern</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to them which should hereafter believe on him to life</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;everlasting.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:017 Now unto the King eternal   immortal   invisible   the only wise</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;God   be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:018 This charge I commit unto thee   son Timothy   according to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prophecies which went before on thee   that thou by them</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mightest war a good warfare;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:019 Holding faith   and a good conscience; which some having put</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;away concerning faith have made shipwreck:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:020 Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Satan   that they may learn not to blaspheme.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:001 I exhort therefore   that   first of all   supplications</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prayers   intercessions   and giving of thanks   be made for all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;men;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:002 For kings   and for all that are in authority; that we may lead</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;a quiet and peaceable life in all godliness and honesty.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:003 For this is good and acceptable in the sight of God our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Saviour;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:004 Who will have all men to be saved   and to come unto the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;knowledge of the truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:005 For there is one God   and one mediator between God and men</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the man Christ Jesus;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:006 Who gave himself a ransom for all   to be testified in due</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;time.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:007 Whereunto I am ordained a preacher   and an apostle   (I speak</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the truth in Christ   and lie not;) a teacher of the Gentiles</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in faith and verity.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:008 I will therefore that men pray every where   lifting up holy</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hands   without wrath and doubting.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:009 In like manner also   that women adorn themselves in modest</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apparel   with shamefacedness and sobriety; not with broided</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hair   or gold   or pearls   or costly array;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:010 But (which becometh women professing godliness) with good</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;works.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:011 Let the woman learn in silence with all subjection.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:012 But I suffer not a woman to teach   nor to usurp authority over</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the man   but to be in silence.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:013 For Adam was first formed   then Eve.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:014 And Adam was not deceived   but the woman being deceived was in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the transgression.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:015 Notwithstanding she shall be saved in childbearing   if they</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;continue in faith and charity and holiness with sobriety.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:001 This is a true saying   If a man desire the office of a bishop</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;he desireth a good work.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:002 A bishop then must be blameless   the husband of one wife</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vigilant   sober   of good behaviour   given to hospitality   apt</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to teach;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:003 Not given to wine   no striker   not greedy of filthy lucre; but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;patient   not a brawler   not covetous;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:004 One that ruleth well his own house   having his children in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;subjection with all gravity;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:005 (For if a man know not how to rule his own house   how shall he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;take care of the church of God?)</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:006 Not a novice   lest being lifted up with pride he fall into the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;condemnation of the devil.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:007 Moreover he must have a good report of them which are without;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lest he fall into reproach and the snare of the devil.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:008 Likewise must the deacons be grave   not doubletongued   not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;given to much wine   not greedy of filthy lucre;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:009 Holding the mystery of the faith in a pure conscience.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:010 And let these also first be proved; then let them use the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;office of a deacon   being found blameless.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:011 Even so must their wives be grave   not slanderers   sober</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;faithful in all things.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:012 Let the deacons be the husbands of one wife   ruling their</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;children and their own houses well.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:013 For they that have used the office of a deacon well purchase</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to themselves a good degree   and great boldness in the faith</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which is in Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:014 These things write I unto thee   hoping to come unto thee</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shortly:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:015 But if I tarry long   that thou mayest know how thou oughtest</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to behave thyself in the house of God   which is the church of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the living God   the pillar and ground of the truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:016 And without controversy great is the mystery of godliness: God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;was manifest in the flesh   justified in the Spirit   seen of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;angels   preached unto the Gentiles   believed on in the world</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;received up into glory.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:001 Now the Spirit speaketh expressly   that in the latter times</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;some shall depart from the faith   giving heed to seducing</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;spirits   and doctrines of devils;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:002 Speaking lies in hypocrisy; having their conscience seared</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;with a hot iron;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:003 Forbidding to marry   and commanding to abstain from meats</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which God hath created to be received with thanksgiving of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them which believe and know the truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:004 For every creature of God is good   and nothing to be refused</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;if it be received with thanksgiving:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:005 For it is sanctified by the word of God and prayer.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:006 If thou put the brethren in remembrance of these things   thou</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shalt be a good minister of Jesus Christ   nourished up in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;words of faith and of good doctrine   whereunto thou hast</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;attained.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:007 But refuse profane and old wives' fables   and exercise thyself</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rather unto godliness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:008 For bodily exercise profiteth little: but godliness is</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;profitable unto all things   having promise of the life that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;now is   and of that which is to come.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:009 This is a faithful saying and worthy of all acceptation.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:010 For therefore we both labour and suffer reproach   because we</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;trust in the living God   who is the Saviour of all men</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;specially of those that believe.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:011 These things command and teach.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:012 Let no man despise thy youth; but be thou an example of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;believers   in word   in conversation   in charity   in spirit   in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;faith   in purity.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:013 Till I come   give attendance to reading   to exhortation   to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doctrine.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:014 Neglect not the gift that is in thee   which was given thee by</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;prophecy   with the laying on of the hands of the presbytery.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:015 Meditate upon these things; give thyself wholly to them; that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;thy profiting may appear to all.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:016 Take heed unto thyself   and unto the doctrine; continue in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them: for in doing this thou shalt both save thyself   and them</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that hear thee.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:001 Rebuke not an elder   but intreat him as a father; and the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;younger men as brethren;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:002 The elder women as mothers; the younger as sisters   with all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;purity.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:003 Honour widows that are widows indeed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:004 But if any widow have children or nephews   let them learn</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;first to shew piety at home   and to requite their parents: for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that is good and acceptable before God.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:005 Now she that is a widow indeed   and desolate   trusteth in God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and continueth in supplications and prayers night and day.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:006 But she that liveth in pleasure is dead while she liveth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:007 And these things give in charge   that they may be blameless.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:008 But if any provide not for his own   and specially for those of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;his own house   he hath denied the faith   and is worse than an</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;infidel.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:009 Let not a widow be taken into the number under threescore</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;years old   having been the wife of one man.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:010 Well reported of for good works; if she have brought up</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;children   if she have lodged strangers   if she have washed the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;saints' feet   if she have relieved the afflicted   if she have</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;diligently followed every good work.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:011 But the younger widows refuse: for when they have begun to wax</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;wanton against Christ   they will marry;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:012 Having damnation   because they have cast off their first</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:013 And withal they learn to be idle   wandering about from house</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to house; and not only idle   but tattlers also and busybodies</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;speaking things which they ought not.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:014 I will therefore that the younger women marry   bear children</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;guide the house   give none occasion to the adversary to speak</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;reproachfully.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:015 For some are already turned aside after Satan.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:016 If any man or woman that believeth have widows   let them</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;relieve them   and let not the church be charged; that it may</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;relieve them that are widows indeed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:017 Let the elders that rule well be counted worthy of double</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;honour   especially they who labour in the word and doctrine.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:018 For the scripture saith   Thou shalt not muzzle the ox that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;treadeth out the corn. And   The labourer is worthy of his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;reward.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:019 Against an elder receive not an accusation   but before two or</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;three witnesses.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:020 Them that sin rebuke before all   that others also may fear.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:021 I charge thee before God   and the Lord Jesus Christ   and the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;elect angels   that thou observe these things without</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;preferring one before another   doing nothing by partiality.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:022 Lay hands suddenly on no man   neither be partaker of other</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;men's sins: keep thyself pure.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:023 Drink no longer water   but use a little wine for thy stomach's</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sake and thine often infirmities.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:024 Some men's sins are open beforehand   going before to judgment;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and some men they follow after.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>005:025 Likewise also the good works of some are manifest beforehand;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and they that are otherwise cannot be hid.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:001 Let as many servants as are under the yoke count their own</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;masters worthy of all honour   that the name of God and his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doctrine be not blasphemed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:002 And they that have believing masters   let them not despise</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them   because they are brethren; but rather do them service</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;because they are faithful and beloved   partakers of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;benefit. These things teach and exhort.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:003 If any man teach otherwise   and consent not to wholesome</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;words   even the words of our Lord Jesus Christ   and to the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doctrine which is according to godliness;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:004 He is proud   knowing nothing   but doting about questions and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;strifes of words   whereof cometh envy   strife   railings   evil</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;surmisings</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:005 Perverse disputings of men of corrupt minds   and destitute of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the truth   supposing that gain is godliness: from such</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;withdraw thyself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:006 But godliness with contentment is great gain.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:007 For we brought nothing into this world   and it is certain we</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;can carry nothing out.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:008 And having food and raiment let us be therewith content.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:009 But they that will be rich fall into temptation and a snare</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and into many foolish and hurtful lusts   which drown men in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;destruction and perdition.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:010 For the love of money is the root of all evil: which while</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;some coveted after   they have erred from the faith   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;pierced themselves through with many sorrows.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:011 But thou   O man of God   flee these things; and follow after</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;righteousness   godliness   faith   love   patience   meekness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:012 Fight the good fight of faith   lay hold on eternal life</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;whereunto thou art also called   and hast professed a good</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;profession before many witnesses.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:013 I give thee charge in the sight of God   who quickeneth all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;things   and before Christ Jesus   who before Pontius Pilate</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;witnessed a good confession;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:014 That thou keep this commandment without spot   unrebukable</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;until the appearing of our Lord Jesus Christ:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:015 Which in his times he shall shew   who is the blessed and only</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Potentate   the King of kings   and Lord of lords;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:016 Who only hath immortality   dwelling in the light which no man</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;can approach unto; whom no man hath seen   nor can see: to whom</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be honour and power everlasting. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:017 Charge them that are rich in this world   that they be not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;highminded   nor trust in uncertain riches   but in the living</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;God   who giveth us richly all things to enjoy;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:018 That they do good   that they be rich in good works   ready to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;distribute   willing to communicate;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:019 Laying up in store for themselves a good foundation against</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the time to come   that they may lay hold on eternal life.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:020 O Timothy   keep that which is committed to thy trust   avoiding</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;profane and vain babblings   and oppositions of science falsely</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;so called:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>006:021 Which some professing have erred concerning the faith. Grace</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be with thee. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Book 55   2 Timothy</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:001 Paul   an apostle of Jesus Christ by the will of God   according</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to the promise of life which is in Christ Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:002 To Timothy   my dearly beloved son: Grace   mercy   and peace</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;from God the Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:003 I thank God   whom I serve from my forefathers with pure</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;conscience   that without ceasing I have remembrance of thee in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;my prayers night and day;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:004 Greatly desiring to see thee   being mindful of thy tears   that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;I may be filled with joy;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 When I call to remembrance the unfeigned faith that is in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;thee   which dwelt first in thy grandmother Lois   and thy</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mother Eunice; and I am persuaded that in thee also.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 Wherefore I put thee in remembrance that thou stir up the gift</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of God   which is in thee by the putting on of my hands.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and of love   and of a sound mind.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 Be not thou therefore ashamed of the testimony of our Lord</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;nor of me his prisoner: but be thou partaker of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;afflictions of the gospel according to the power of God;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 Who hath saved us   and called us with an holy calling   not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;according to our works   but according to his own purpose and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;grace   which was given us in Christ Jesus before the world</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;began</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 But is now made manifest by the appearing of our Saviour Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ   who hath abolished death   and hath brought life and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;immortality to light through the gospel:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 Whereunto I am appointed a preacher   and an apostle   and a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teacher of the Gentiles.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 For the which cause I also suffer these things: nevertheless I</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;am not ashamed: for I know whom I have believed   and am</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;persuaded that he is able to keep that which I have committed</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto him against that day.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:013 Hold fast the form of sound words   which thou hast heard of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;me   in faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:014 That good thing which was committed unto thee keep by the Holy</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ghost which dwelleth in us.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:015 This thou knowest   that all they which are in Asia be turned</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;away from me; of whom are Phygellus and Hermogenes.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:016 The Lord give mercy unto the house of Onesiphorus; for he oft</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;refreshed me   and was not ashamed of my chain:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:017 But   when he was in Rome   he sought me out very diligently</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and found me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:018 The Lord grant unto him that he may find mercy of the Lord in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that day: and in how many things he ministered unto me at</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Ephesus   thou knowest very well.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:001 Thou therefore   my son   be strong in the grace that is in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:002 And the things that thou hast heard of me among many</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;witnesses   the same commit thou to faithful men   who shall be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;able to teach others also.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:003 Thou therefore endure hardness   as a good soldier of Jesus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:004 No man that warreth entangleth himself with the affairs of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;this life; that he may please him who hath chosen him to be a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;soldier.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:005 And if a man also strive for masteries   yet is he not crowned</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;except he strive lawfully.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:006 The husbandman that laboureth must be first partaker of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;fruits.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:007 Consider what I say; and the Lord give thee understanding in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all things.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:008 Remember that Jesus Christ of the seed of David was raised</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;from the dead according to my gospel:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:009 Wherein I suffer trouble   as an evil doer   even unto bonds;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;but the word of God is not bound.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:010 Therefore I endure all things for the elect's sakes   that they</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;may also obtain the salvation which is in Christ Jesus with</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;eternal glory.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:011 It is a faithful saying: For if we be dead with him   we shall</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;also live with him:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:012 If we suffer   we shall also reign with him: if we deny him   he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;also will deny us:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:013 If we believe not   yet he abideth faithful: he cannot deny</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;himself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:014 Of these things put them in remembrance   charging them before</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Lord that they strive not about words to no profit   but to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the subverting of the hearers.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:015 Study to shew thyself approved unto God   a workman that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;needeth not to be ashamed   rightly dividing the word of truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:016 But shun profane and vain babblings: for they will increase</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto more ungodliness.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:017 And their word will eat as doth a canker: of whom is Hymenaeus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and Philetus;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:018 Who concerning the truth have erred   saying that the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;resurrection is past already; and overthrow the faith of some.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:019 Nevertheless the foundation of God standeth sure   having this</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;seal   The Lord knoweth them that are his. And   Let every one</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that nameth the name of Christ depart from iniquity.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:020 But in a great house there are not only vessels of gold and of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;silver   but also of wood and of earth; and some to honour   and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;some to dishonour.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:021 If a man therefore purge himself from these   he shall be a</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vessel unto honour   sanctified   and meet for the master's use</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and prepared unto every good work.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:022 Flee also youthful lusts: but follow righteousness   faith</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;charity   peace   with them that call on the Lord out of a pure</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;heart.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:023 But foolish and unlearned questions avoid   knowing that they</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;do gender strifes.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:024 And the servant of the Lord must not strive; but be gentle</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto all men   apt to teach   patient</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:025 In meekness instructing those that oppose themselves; if God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;peradventure will give them repentance to the acknowledging of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the truth;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:026 And that they may recover themselves out of the snare of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;devil   who are taken captive by him at his will.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:001 This know also   that in the last days perilous times shall</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;come.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:002 For men shall be lovers of their own selves   covetous</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;boasters   proud   blasphemers   disobedient to parents</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unthankful   unholy</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:003 Without natural affection   trucebreakers   false accusers</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;incontinent   fierce   despisers of those that are good</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:004 Traitors   heady   highminded   lovers of pleasures more than</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lovers of God;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:005 Having a form of godliness   but denying the power thereof:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;from such turn away.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:006 For of this sort are they which creep into houses   and lead</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;captive silly women laden with sins   led away with divers</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;lusts</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:007 Ever learning   and never able to come to the knowledge of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:008 Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses   so do these also</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;resist the truth: men of corrupt minds   reprobate concerning</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the faith.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:009 But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;manifest unto all men   as their's also was.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:010 But thou hast fully known my doctrine   manner of life</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;purpose   faith   longsuffering   charity   patience</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:011 Persecutions   afflictions   which came unto me at Antioch   at</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Iconium   at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;them all the Lord delivered me.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:012 Yea   and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;persecution.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:013 But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deceiving   and being deceived.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:014 But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;hast been assured of   knowing of whom thou hast learned them;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:015 And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which is in Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:016 All scripture is given by inspiration of God   and is</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;profitable for doctrine   for reproof   for correction   for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;instruction in righteousness:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:017 That the man of God may be perfect   throughly furnished unto</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all good works.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:001 I charge thee therefore before God   and the Lord Jesus Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;who shall judge the quick and the dead at his appearing and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;his kingdom;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:002 Preach the word; be instant in season   out of season; reprove</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;rebuke   exhort with all longsuffering and doctrine.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:003 For the time will come when they will not endure sound</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doctrine; but after their own lusts shall they heap to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;themselves teachers   having itching ears;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:004 And they shall turn away their ears from the truth   and shall</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be turned unto fables.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:005 But watch thou in all things   endure afflictions   do the work</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of an evangelist   make full proof of thy ministry.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:006 For I am now ready to be offered   and the time of my departure</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;is at hand.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:007 I have fought a good fight   I have finished my course   I have</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;kept the faith:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:008 Henceforth there is laid up for me a crown of righteousness</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which the Lord   the righteous judge   shall give me at that</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;day: and not to me only   but unto all them also that love his</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;appearing.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:009 Do thy diligence to come shortly unto me:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:010 For Demas hath forsaken me   having loved this present world</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and is departed unto Thessalonica; Crescens to Galatia   Titus</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto Dalmatia.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:011 Only Luke is with me. Take Mark   and bring him with thee: for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;he is profitable to me for the ministry.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:012 And Tychicus have I sent to Ephesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:013 The cloke that I left at Troas with Carpus   when thou comest</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bring with thee   and the books   but especially the parchments.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:014 Alexander the coppersmith did me much evil: the Lord reward</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;him according to his works:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:015 Of whom be thou ware also; for he hath greatly withstood our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;words.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:016 At my first answer no man stood with me   but all men forsook</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;me: I pray God that it may not be laid to their charge.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:017 Notwithstanding the Lord stood with me   and strengthened me;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that by me the preaching might be fully known   and that all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the Gentiles might hear: and I was delivered out of the mouth</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the lion.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:018 And the Lord shall deliver me from every evil work   and will</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;preserve me unto his heavenly kingdom: to whom be glory for</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;ever and ever. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:019 Salute Prisca and Aquila   and the household of Onesiphorus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:020 Erastus abode at Corinth: but Trophimus have I left at Miletum</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sick.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:021 Do thy diligence to come before winter. Eubulus greeteth thee</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and Pudens   and Linus   and Claudia   and all the brethren.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>004:022 The Lord Jesus Christ be with thy spirit. Grace be with you.</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Book 56   Titus</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:001 Paul   a servant of God   and an apostle of Jesus Christ</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;according to the faith of God's elect   and the acknowledging</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of the truth which is after godliness;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:002 In hope of eternal life   which God   that cannot lie   promised</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;before the world began;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:003 But hath in due times manifested his word through preaching</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;which is committed unto me according to the commandment of God</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;our Saviour;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:004 To Titus   mine own son after the common faith: Grace   mercy</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and peace   from God the Father and the Lord Jesus Christ our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Saviour.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 For this cause left I thee in Crete   that thou shouldest set</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in order the things that are wanting   and ordain elders in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;every city   as I had appointed thee:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 If any be blameless   the husband of one wife   having faithful</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;children not accused of riot or unruly.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 For a bishop must be blameless   as the steward of God; not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;selfwilled   not soon angry   not given to wine   no striker   not</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;given to filthy lucre;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 But a lover of hospitality   a lover of good men   sober   just</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;holy   temperate;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 Holding fast the faithful word as he hath been taught   that he</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;may be able by sound doctrine both to exhort and to convince</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the gainsayers.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 For there are many unruly and vain talkers and deceivers</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;specially they of the circumcision:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 Whose mouths must be stopped   who subvert whole houses</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;teaching things which they ought not   for filthy lucre's sake.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 One of themselves   even a prophet of their own   said   The</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Cretians are alway liars   evil beasts   slow bellies.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:013 This witness is true. Wherefore rebuke them sharply   that they</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;may be sound in the faith;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:014 Not giving heed to Jewish fables   and commandments of men</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that turn from the truth.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:015 Unto the pure all things are pure: but unto them that are</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;defiled and unbelieving is nothing pure; but even their mind</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and conscience is defiled.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:016 They profess that they know God; but in works they deny him</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;being abominable   and disobedient   and unto every good work</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;reprobate.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:001 But speak thou the things which become sound doctrine:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:002 That the aged men be sober   grave   temperate   sound in faith</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;in charity   in patience.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:003 The aged women likewise   that they be in behaviour as becometh</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;holiness   not false accusers   not given to much wine   teachers</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of good things;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:004 That they may teach the young women to be sober   to love their</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;husbands   to love their children</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:005 To be discreet   chaste   keepers at home   good   obedient to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;their own husbands   that the word of God be not blasphemed.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:006 Young men likewise exhort to be sober minded.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:007 In all things shewing thyself a pattern of good works: in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;doctrine shewing uncorruptness   gravity   sincerity</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:008 Sound speech   that cannot be condemned; that he that is of the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;contrary part may be ashamed   having no evil thing to say of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:009 Exhort servants to be obedient unto their own masters   and to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;please them well in all things; not answering again;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:010 Not purloining   but shewing all good fidelity; that they may</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;adorn the doctrine of God our Saviour in all things.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:011 For the grace of God that bringeth salvation hath appeared to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;all men</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:012 Teaching us that   denying ungodliness and worldly lusts   we</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;should live soberly   righteously   and godly   in this present</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;world;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:013 Looking for that blessed hope   and the glorious appearing of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the great God and our Saviour Jesus Christ;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:014 Who gave himself for us   that he might redeem us from all</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;iniquity   and purify unto himself a peculiar people   zealous</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;of good works.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>002:015 These things speak   and exhort   and rebuke with all authority.</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Let no man despise thee.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:001 Put them in mind to be subject to principalities and powers</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to obey magistrates   to be ready to every good work</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:002 To speak evil of no man   to be no brawlers   but gentle</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shewing all meekness unto all men.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:003 For we ourselves also were sometimes foolish   disobedient</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;deceived   serving divers lusts and pleasures   living in malice</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and envy   hateful   and hating one another.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:004 But after that the kindness and love of God our Saviour toward</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;man appeared</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:005 Not by works of righteousness which we have done   but</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;according to his mercy he saved us   by the washing of</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;regeneration   and renewing of the Holy Ghost;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:006 Which he shed on us abundantly through Jesus Christ our</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Saviour;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:007 That being justified by his grace   we should be made heirs</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;according to the hope of eternal life.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:008 This is a faithful saying   and these things I will that thou</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;affirm constantly   that they which have believed in God might</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;be careful to maintain good works. These things are good and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;profitable unto men.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:009 But avoid foolish questions   and genealogies   and contentions</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and strivings about the law; for they are unprofitable and</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vain.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:010 A man that is an heretick after the first and second</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;admonition reject;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:011 Knowing that he that is such is subverted   and sinneth   being</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;condemned of himself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:012 When I shall send Artemas unto thee   or Tychicus   be diligent</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;to come unto me to Nicopolis: for I have determined there to</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;winter.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:013 Bring Zenas the lawyer and Apollos on their journey</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;diligently   that nothing be wanting unto them.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:014 And let our's also learn to maintain good works for necessary</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;uses   that they be not unfruitful.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>003:015 All that are with me salute thee. Greet them that love us in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the faith. Grace be with you all. Amen.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Book 57   Philemon</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:001 Paul   a prisoner of Jesus Christ   and Timothy our brother</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;unto Philemon our dearly beloved   and fellowlabourer</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:002 And to our beloved Apphia   and Archippus our fellowsoldier</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;and to the church in thy house:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:003 Grace to you   and peace   from God our Father and the Lord</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:004 I thank my God   making mention of thee always in my prayers</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:005 Hearing of thy love and faith   which thou hast toward the Lord</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Jesus   and toward all saints;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:006 That the communication of thy faith may become effectual by</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;the acknowledging of every good thing which is in you in</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Christ Jesus.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:007 For we have great joy and consolation in thy love   because the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bowels of the saints are refreshed by thee   brother.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:008 Wherefore   though I might be much bold in Christ to enjoin</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;thee that which is convenient</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:009 Yet for love's sake I rather beseech thee   being such an one</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;as Paul the aged   and now also a prisoner of Jesus Christ.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:010 I beseech thee for my son Onesimus   whom I have begotten in my</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bonds:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:011 Which in time past was to thee unprofitable   but now</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;profitable to thee and to me:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:012 Whom I have sent again: thou therefore receive him   that is</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;mine own bowels:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:013 Whom I would have retained with me   that in thy stead he might</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;have ministered unto me in the bonds of the gospel:</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:014 But without thy mind would I do nothing; that thy benefit</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;should not be as it were of necessity   but willingly.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:015 For perhaps he therefore departed for a season   that thou</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;shouldest receive him for ever;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:016 Not now as a servant   but above a servant   a brother beloved</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;specially to me   but how much more unto thee   both in the</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;flesh   and in the Lord?</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:017 If thou count me therefore a partner   receive him as myself.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:018 If he hath wronged thee   or oweth thee ought   put that on mine</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;account;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:019 I Paul have written it with mine own hand   I will repay it:</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;albeit I do not say to thee how thou owest unto me even thine</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;own self besides.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:020 Yea   brother   let me have joy of thee in the Lord: refresh my</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;bowels in the Lord.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:021 Having confidence in thy obedience I wrote unto thee   knowing</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;that thou wilt also do more than I say.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:022 But withal prepare me also a lodging: for I trust that through</p><p>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;your prayers I shall be given unto you.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:023 There salute thee Epaphras   my fellowprisoner in Christ Jesus;</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:024 Marcus   Aristarchus   Demas   Lucas   my fellowlabourers.</p><p>&nbsp;</p><p>001:025 The grace of our Lord Jesus Christ be with your spirit.
